snippet.title: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon - PS3 / X360 - Pesticide Gun Trailer
snippet.description:
The Pesticide Gun is one of over the 300 available weapons and it does a massive amount of damage over a large radius. They are Tier 8 Weapons meaning you have to do some serious earth protecting to earn these!

Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon is coming this Spring 2011 on PS3 and Xbox 360.

Join the squad on http://www.facebook.com/#!/EarthDefenseForce for ever burning news or check the official website http://www.earthdefenseforce.net/
